metadata.title: CVE-2015-7885 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The dgnc_mgmt_ioctl function in drivers/staging/dgnc/dgnc_mgmt.c in theLinux kernel through 4.3.3 does not initialize a certain structure member,which allows local users to obtain sensitive information from kernel memoryvia a crafted application.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7885` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.3.0-1-generic - 4.3.0-1.10
linux-image-4.3.0-1-generic-lpae - 4.3.0-1.10
